thread.title: Bulldog Bytes Podcast: Pushing forward without Nick Chubb & where Bulldogs go from here
thread.title_full: Bulldog Bytes Podcast: Pushing forward without Nick Chubb & where Bulldogs go from here

author: Marc Weiszer
title: Bulldog Bytes Podcast: Pushing forward without Nick Chubb & where Bulldogs go from here
text:
UGA postgame report: 'Weâ€™ll keep fighting because we hate losing regardless of what the record is' 
Georgia experienced a double dose of bad news on Saturday, losing to Tennessee after blowing a 21-point lead and losing its best player, star running back Nick Chubb, for the season with a knee injury. 
Marc Weiszer and Fletcher Page of the Athens Banner-Herald look back at what transpired in Knoxville in the 38-31 defeat and discuss where Georgia goes from here. 
Who can step up on offense? Fletcher continues to have big questions about Greyson Lambert. And what about the way the defense provided little resistance as the Vols stormed back? 
Georgia picks itself up now and gets ready for Missouri on Saturday. 
Click below to listen to it all.
